languages.text: {n}Абеляр прожигает Зауэрбэка взглядом — и вдруг кивает.{/n} "Ты не лжешь. Зато лжет кое-кто иной, готовая ради своих целей уничтожить и тебя, и весь твой род".
{n}Abelard studies Sauerback, then suddenly nods.{/n} "You are not lying. But someone else is, someone who is poised to destroy both you and your family for her own gain."
languages.original_text: {n}Абеляр прожигает Зауэрбэка взглядом — и вдруг кивает.{/n} "Ты не лжешь. Зато лжет кое-кто иной, готовая ради своих целей уничтожить и тебя, и весь твой род".

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard burns the Sauerback with his gaze, then suddenly nods.{/n} "You are not lying. But someone else is — someone who is prepared to destroy both you and your family for her own gain."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard burns the Sauerback with his gaze, then suddenly nods.{/n} "You are not lying. But someone else is — someone who is prepared to destroy both you and your family for her own gain."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard stares at Sauerback, then suddenly nods.{/n} "You are not lying. But someone else is, someone who is poised to destroy both you and your family for her own gain."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard stares at Sauerback, then suddenly nods.{/n} "You are not lying. But someone else is, someone who is poised to destroy both you and your family for her own gain."

traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}アベラルドはザウアーバックを観察してから急に頷く。{/n}「嘘偽りのない言葉ですね。しかし他の者が嘘をついています。己の利益のため、あなたとその一族を破滅させようとした女が」
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard studies Sauerback, then suddenly nods.{/n} "You are not lying. But someone else is, someone who is poised to destroy both you and your family for her own gain."

traits.locale_text: {n}アベラルドはザウアーバックを観察してから急に頷く。{/n}「嘘偽りのない言葉ですね。しかし他の者が嘘をついています。己の利益のため、あなたとその一族を破滅させようとした女が」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}阿贝拉德盯着苏尔贝克看了半晌，突然点了点头。{/n}“你没有撒谎，但有人在撒谎。有个女人打算为了一己私欲，毁掉你和你的家族。”
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard studies Sauerback, then suddenly nods.{/n} "You are not lying. But someone else is, someone who is poised to destroy both you and your family for her own gain."

traits.locale_text: {n}阿贝拉德盯着苏尔贝克看了半晌，突然点了点头。{/n}“你没有撒谎，但有人在撒谎。有人准备为了一己私欲，毁掉你和你的家族。”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Abélard observe attentivement Sauerback, puis hoche la tête.{/n} « Vous dites la vérité. Mais ce n'est pas le cas de tous ici. Quelqu'un, en particulier, cherche à vous détruire, vous et votre famille, pour son propre intérêt. »
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard studies Sauerback, then suddenly nods.{/n} "You are not lying. But someone else is, someone who is poised to destroy both you and your family for her own gain."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abélard observe attentivement Sauerback, puis hoche la tête.{/n} « Vous dites la vérité. Mais ce n'est pas le cas de tous ici. Quelqu'un, en particulier, cherche à vous détruire, vous et votre famille, pour son propre intérêt. »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Abelard mira fijamente a Sauerback y asiente.{/n} «No miente, pero hay alguien que sí que lo hace, alguien dispuesto a destruirle a usted y a su familia por su propio beneficio».
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard studies Sauerback, then suddenly nods.{/n} "You are not lying. But someone else is, someone who is poised to destroy both you and your family for her own gain."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard mira fijamente a Sauerback y asiente.{/n} «No miente, pero hay alguien que sí que lo hace, alguien dispuesto a destruirle a usted y a su familia por su propio beneficio».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Abelard mustert Sauerback und nickt dann plötzlich.{/n} "Ihr lügt nicht. Aber jemand anders lügt. Eine Frau, die für ihren persönlichen Gewinn Euch und Eure Familie zerstören würde."
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard studies Sauerback, then suddenly nods.{/n} "You are not lying. But someone else is, someone who is poised to destroy both you and your family for her own gain."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard starrt Sauerback an und nickt dann plötzlich.{/n} "Ihr lügt nicht. Aber jemand anders lügt. Eine Frau, die für ihren persönlichen Gewinn Euch und Eure Familie zerstören würde."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Abelard, Sauerback'i gözlemledikten sonra birden onaylıyor.{/n} "Söylediklerin doğru ama bir başkası yalan söylüyor. Kendi çıkarı için hem seni hem de haneni ortadan kaldırmaya niyetli birisi."
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard studies Sauerback, then suddenly nods.{/n} "You are not lying. But someone else is, someone who is poised to destroy both you and your family for her own gain."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard, Sauerback'i gözlemledikten sonra birden onaylıyor.{/n} "Söylediklerin doğru ama bir başkası yalan söylüyor. Kendi çıkarı için hem seni hem de haneni yok etmeye niyetli bir kadın."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion
